name[TOK_Q_DELIM]هدست واقعیت افزوده Holo.query: name: The name of the item.

image[TOK_Q_DELIM]https://hitshop.ir/pro.query: image: An image of the item. This can be a [[URL]] or a fully described [[ImageObject]].

description[TOK_Q_DELIM]هدست واقعیت افزو.query: description: A description of the item.

value[TOK_Q_DELIM]579[TOK_Q_DELIM]Quanti.query:
value: The value of a [[QuantitativeValue]] (including [[Observation]]) or property value node.

* For [[QuantitativeValue]] and [[MonetaryAmount]], the recommended type for values is 'Number'.
* For [[PropertyValue]], it can be 'Text', 'Number', 'Boolean', or 'StructuredValue'.
* Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
* Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.

unitCode[TOK_Q_DELIM]GRM[TOK_Q_DELIM]Qua.query: unitCode: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL. Other codes than the UN/CEFACT Common Code may be used with a prefix followed by a colon.

category[TOK_Q_DELIM]هدست‌های واقعیت افز.query: category: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

releaseDate[TOK_Q_DELIM]2020-07-20T01:46.query: releaseDate: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.
